label: AB3_tP8_113_a_ce-001
title: BaS$_{3}$ ($D0_{17}$) Structure
comments: (Gottfried, 1938) originally gave the $D0_{17}$ label to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_oP16_18_ab_3c-001}{$P2_12_12$ \#94 BaS$_{3}$ structure}, however we follow (Parthe\'{e}, 1993), who uses the current structure as the $D0_{17}$ prototype.
